mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xinmusic_comments (id, show_id, from_user_id, to_user_id, to_id, content, `like`, status, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{showId}, #{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{toId}, #{content}, #{like}, #{status}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.nickname, b.avatar FROM xinmusic_comments a LEFT JOIN xinmusic_base_user b ON b.userid = a.from_user_id WHERE a.show_id = #{showId} ORDER BY a.create_time
